columns.title: Columns
columns.description:
Please select columns you wish to cluster by your data. This should be a categorical value.
Leaving this empty will take n valid unique 10% columns based on maximum cutoff size.

first_n_columns.title: First (n) columns
first_n_columns.description: If you have not selected any Columns we will take first n columns from your dataset, based on this value, that have number of unique values less than 10%.

preprocess.title: Preprocess
preprocess.description: Should we apply preprocessing ('medianImpute', 'center', 'scale') and remove 'near-zero-variance' features before any calculation?

remove_na.title: Remove NA?
remove_na.description: Should we drop rows with NA values in dataset before any calculation?

perplexity.title: Perplexity
perplexity.description: The performance of SNE is fairly robust to changes in the perplexity, and typical values are between 5 and 50.
